episodes.title: Podcast Interview: Marvel's Netflix Makeup Artist Sarit Klein
episodes.description: This week Gary and Justus interview lead makeup artist Sarit Klein. We talk makeup, blood, scars, bruises, tattoos, facial hair, glitz and glam. This is a perfect podcast to learn more about the collaboration process when making a show. We dive deep into the development of different characters and visual aesthetics for the Marvel Netflix shows like Daredevil, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage, and The Defenders.  We chat about the give and take of using practical effects vs cgi and how makeup tells a story. We also talk about zombies and vampires

episodes.title: So Padme, why did you choose Anakin? Feat. Comic Books Couples Counseling
episodes.description: The "Comic Books Couples Counseling" podcast joins Pod Wars to help perform a counseling session for Anakin and Padme! We use the enneagram to dissect the personality traits of these characters, allowing us to look at everything course, rough, and irritating with their relationship. Expect plenty of sand, dead younglings, and aggressive negotiations

episodes.title: Naughty Toddlers and Possible Cults
episodes.description: This week Gary and Justus dive back into the amazing series of the Mandalorian. We have a ton of fun breaking down and discussing episodes two and three. We talk controversies and speculate what is to come in the next episode. We round out the show with our famous comic of the week where Justus breaks down the recently released Darth Vader #7.
